name: Umiko: Showdown of Seas
description:
Umiko is about a fish lady princess which lands emerged long ago, stripping her away from her kingdom and putting everyone in great danger. 
A horde of frog like creatures ravages the lands, and only her has the power to face them all.

FEATURES & NARRATIVE CONTENT

  • 8 Unique formable weapons
  • 4 Levels 
  • 5+ Craftable powerups

DEVELOPED BY:

BEWARE BANANA BOMBS (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2018/2019)

Game Design
Enrico Martina
Edoardo Marchetto
Fabio Zanetta

Programming
Francesco Micheletti
Diego Cugno

Concept Art

Oscar Burigana

3D Art
